00077 void Micropolis::sendMessages()
00078 {
00079     short PowerPop;
00080     float TM;
00081 
00082     // Running a scenario, and waiting it to 'end' so we can give a score
00083     if (scenario > SC_NONE && scoreType > SC_NONE && scoreWait > 0) {
00084         scoreWait--;
00085         if (scoreWait == 0) {
00086             doScenarioScore(scoreType);
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00090     checkGrowth();
00091 
00092     totalZonePop = resZonePop + comZonePop + indZonePop;
00093     PowerPop = nuclearPowerPop + coalPowerPop;
00094 
00095     switch (cityTime & 63) {
00096 
00097     case 1:
00098         if (totalZonePop / 4 >= resZonePop) {
00099             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_MORE_RESIDENTIAL);
00100         }
00101         break;
00102 
00103     case 5:
00104         if (totalZonePop / 8 >= comZonePop) {
00105             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_MORE_COMMERCIAL);
00106         }
00107         break;
00108 
00109     case 10:
00110         if (totalZonePop / 8 >= indZonePop) {
00111             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_MORE_INDUSTRIAL);
00112         }
00113         break;
00114 
00115     case 14:
00116         if (totalZonePop > 10 && totalZonePop * 2 > roadTotal) {
00117             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_MORE_ROADS);
00118         }
00119         break;
00120 
00121     case 18:
00122         if (totalZonePop > 50 && totalZonePop > railTotal) {
00123             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_MORE_RAILS);
00124         }
00125         break;
00126 
00127     case 22:
00128         if (totalZonePop > 10 && PowerPop == 0) {
00129             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_ELECTRICITY);
00130         }
00131         break;
00132 
00133     case 26:
00134         if (resPop > 500 && stadiumPop == 0) {
00135             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_STADIUM);
00136             resCap = true;
00137         } else {
00138             resCap = false;
00139         }
00140         break;
00141 
00142     case 28:
00143         if (indPop > 70 && seaportPop == 0) {
00144             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_SEAPORT);
00145             indCap = true;
00146         } else {
00147             indCap = false;
00148         }
00149         break;
00150 
00151     case 30:
00152         if (comPop > 100 && airportPop == 0) {
00153             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_AIRPORT);
00154             comCap = true;
00155         } else {
00156             comCap = false;
00157         }
00158         break;
00159 
00160     case 32:
00161         TM = (float)(unpoweredZoneCount + poweredZoneCount); /* dec score for unpowered zones */
00162         if (TM > 0) {
00163             if (poweredZoneCount / TM < 0.7) {
00164                 sendMessage(MESSAGE_BLACKOUTS_REPORTED);
00165             }
00166         }
00167         break;
00168 
00169     case 35:
00170         if (pollutionAverage > /* 80 */ 60) {
00171             sendMessage(MESSAGE_HIGH_POLLUTION, -1, -1, true);
00172         }
00173         break;
00174 
00175     case 42:
00176         if (crimeAverage > 100) {
00177             sendMessage(MESSAGE_HIGH_CRIME, -1, -1, true);
00178         }
00179         break;
00180 
00181     case 45:
00182         if (totalPop > 60 && fireStationPop == 0) {
00183             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_FIRE_STATION);
00184         }
00185         break;
00186 
00187     case 48:
00188         if (totalPop > 60 && policeStationPop == 0) {
00189             sendMessage(MESSAGE_NEED_POLICE_STATION);
00190         }
00191         break;
00192 
00193     case 51:
00194         if (cityTax > 12) {
00195             sendMessage(MESSAGE_TAX_TOO_HIGH);
00196         }
00197         break;
00198 
00199     case 54:
00200         // If roadEffect < 5/8 of max effect
00201         if (roadEffect < (5 * MAX_ROAD_EFFECT / 8) && roadTotal > 30) {
00202             sendMessage(MESSAGE_ROAD_NEEDS_FUNDING);
00203         }
00204         break;
00205 
00206     case 57:
00207         // If fireEffect < 0.7 of max effect
00208         if (fireEffect < (7 * MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT / 10) && totalPop > 20) {
00209             sendMessage(MESSAGE_FIRE_STATION_NEEDS_FUNDING);
00210         }
00211         break;
00212 
00213     case 60:
00214         // If policeEffect < 0.7 of max effect
00215         if (policeEffect < (7 * MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT / 10)
00216                                                         && totalPop > 20) {
00217             sendMessage(MESSAGE_POLICE_NEEDS_FUNDING);
00218         }
00219         break;
00220 
00221     case 63:
00222         if (trafficAverage > 60) {
00223             sendMessage(MESSAGE_TRAFFIC_JAMS, -1, -1, true);
00224         }
00225         break;
00226 
00227     }
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00240 void Micropolis::checkGrowth()
00241 {
00242     if ((cityTime & 3) == 0) {
00243         short category = 0;
00244         Quad thisCityPop = getPopulation();
00245 
00246         if (cityPopLast > 0) {
00247 
00248             CityClass lastClass = getCityClass(cityPopLast);
00249             CityClass newClass = getCityClass(thisCityPop);
00250 
00251             if (lastClass != newClass) {
00252 
00253                 // Switched class, find appropiate message.
00254                 switch (newClass) {
00255 
00256                     case CC_VILLAGE:
00257                         // Don't mention it.
00258                         break;
00259 
00260                     case CC_TOWN:
00261                         category = MESSAGE_REACHED_TOWN;
00262                         break;
00263 
00264                     case CC_CITY:
00265                         category = MESSAGE_REACHED_CITY;
00266                         break;
00267 
00268                     case CC_CAPITAL:
00269                         category = MESSAGE_REACHED_CAPITAL;
00270                         break;
00271 
00272                     case CC_METROPOLIS:
00273                         category = MESSAGE_REACHED_METROPOLIS;
00274                         break;
00275 
00276                     case CC_MEGALOPOLIS:
00277                         category = MESSAGE_REACHED_MEGALOPOLIS;
00278                         break;
00279 
00280                     default:
00281                         NOT_REACHED();
00282                         break;
00283 
00284                 }
00285             }
00286         }
00287 
00288         if (category > 0 && category != categoryLast) {
00289             sendMessage(category, NOWHERE, NOWHERE, true);
00290             categoryLast = category;
00291         }
00292 
00293         cityPopLast = thisCityPop;
00294     }
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00303 void Micropolis::doScenarioScore(Scenario type)
00304 {
00305     short z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_LOST;     /* you lose */
00306 
00307     switch (type) {
00308 
00309     case SC_DULLSVILLE:
00310         if (cityClass >= CC_METROPOLIS) {
00311             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00312         }
00313         break;
00314 
00315     case SC_SAN_FRANCISCO:
00316         if (cityClass >= CC_METROPOLIS) {
00317             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00318         }
00319         break;
00320 
00321     case SC_HAMBURG:
00322         if (cityClass >= CC_METROPOLIS) {
00323             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00324         }
00325         break;
00326 
00327     case SC_BERN:
00328         if (trafficAverage < 80) {
00329             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00330         }
00331         break;
00332 
00333     case SC_TOKYO:
00334         if (cityScore > 500) {
00335             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00336         }
00337         break;
00338 
00339     case SC_DETROIT:
00340         if (crimeAverage < 60) {
00341             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00342         }
00343         break;
00344 
00345     case SC_BOSTON:
00346         if (cityScore > 500) {
00347             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00348         }
00349         break;
00350 
00351     case SC_RIO:
00352         if (cityScore > 500) {
00353             z = MESSAGE_SCENARIO_WON;
00354         }
00355         break;
00356 
00357     default:
00358         NOT_REACHED();
00359         break;
00360 
00361     }
00362 
00363     sendMessage(z, NOWHERE, NOWHERE, true, true);
00364 
00365     if (z == MESSAGE_SCENARIO_LOST) {
00366         doLoseGame();
00367     }
00368 }

00380 void Micropolis::sendMessage(short mesgNum, short x, short y, bool picture, bool important)
00381 {
00382     callback("update", "sdddbb", "message",
00383         (int)mesgNum,
00384         (int)x,
00385         (int)y,
00386         picture ? 1 : 0,
00387         important ? 1 : 0);
00388 }

00390 
00397 void Micropolis::doMakeSound(int mesgNum, int x, int y)
00398 {
00399     assert(mesgNum >= 0);
00400 
00401     switch (mesgNum) {
00402 
00403         case MESSAGE_TRAFFIC_JAMS:
00404             if (getRandom(5) == 1) {
00405                 makeSound("city", "HonkHonkMed", x, y);
00406             } else if (getRandom(5) == 1) {
00407                 makeSound("city", "HonkHonkLow", x, y);
00408             } else if (getRandom(5) == 1) {
00409                 makeSound("city", "HonkHonkHigh", x, y);
00410             }
00411             break;
00412 
00413         case MESSAGE_HIGH_CRIME:
00414         case MESSAGE_FIRE_REPORTED:
00415         case MESSAGE_TORNADO_SIGHTED:
00416         case MESSAGE_EARTHQUAKE:
00417         case MESSAGE_PLANE_CRASHED:
00418         case MESSAGE_SHIP_CRASHED:
00419         case MESSAGE_TRAIN_CRASHED:
00420         case MESSAGE_HELICOPTER_CRASHED:
00421             makeSound("city", "Siren", x, y);
00422             break;
00423 
00424         case  MESSAGE_MONSTER_SIGHTED:
00425             makeSound("city", "Monster", x, y);
00426             break;
00427 
00428         case MESSAGE_FIREBOMBING:
00429             makeSound("city", "ExplosionLow", x, y);
00430             makeSound("city", "Siren", x, y);
00431             break;
00432 
00433         case MESSAGE_NUCLEAR_MELTDOWN:
00434             makeSound("city", "ExplosionHigh", x, y);
00435             makeSound("city", "ExplosionLow", x, y);
00436             makeSound("city", "Siren", x, y);
00437             break;
00438 
00439         case MESSAGE_RIOTS_REPORTED:
00440             makeSound("city", "Siren", x, y);
00441             break;
00442 
00443     }
00444 }
00445 
00453 void Micropolis::doAutoGoto(short x, short y, char *msg)
00454 {
00455     callback("autoGoto", "dd", (int)x, (int)y);
00456 }

00460 void Micropolis::doLoseGame()
00461 {
00462     callback("loseGame", "");
00463 }
00464 
00465 
00467 void Micropolis::doWinGame()
00468 {
00469     callback("winGame", "");
00470 }
